**The Supreme Jade Pendant and Golden Diadem Scripture of the Great Ultimate Golden Writ (Upper Volume)**

**Scripture Title:** *The Supreme Jade Pendant and Golden Diadem Scripture of the Great Ultimate Golden Writ (Upper Volume)*. Also known as *The Jade Pendant and Golden Diadem Hidden Writ of the Grand Empyrean and Mysterious True Cavern of the Two Radiant Treasures*.

Author unknown, approximately composed during the Eastern Jin dynasty. A foundational scripture of the early Shangqing tradition. Originally a single scroll in five chapters, later divided into two separate texts.

**Source Text:** *Daoist Canon of the Zhengtong Era*, *Dongzhen* section, *Benwen* category.
**Collated with:** Dunhuang manuscript P.2409 (fragmentary copy).

---

**The Supreme Jade Pendant and Golden Diadem Scripture of the Great Ultimate Golden Writ (Upper Volume)**

On the first day of the first month of the first year of the *Shangling* era, as the Six Origins conjoined in celebration and the cyclical sign *jiazi* governed the dawn, the Celestial Venerable of Primordial Beginning and the Supreme Thearch ascended together upon azure mists and purple auroras, mounting the Nine Profound’s precipice at the formless summit. They wandered the cavern-heavens, roamed the ultimate origin, their gazes sweeping freely, their forms at ease upon the floating wheel. Beholding the Two Modes as they divided, observing the great transformation enduring forever, they looked down upon the imperial throne and rejoiced in the Dao, delighting therein. Surveying the revolutions of time to alter the cosmic measures, they awakened to the turning of the kalpa’s wheel, entreating auspicious omens from the Great Void, expounding the supreme Dharma in the Nine Heavens. They initiated the sacred covenant, purified the altar, and fasted in the Empyrean Court.

On that day, the celestial light suddenly dimmed, sun and moon darkened at noon, the Eight Qi receded, the Seven Origins concealed their essence, the mysterious constellations stagnated, and the myriad perfected fled in spirit. For three days and nights, the azure fowl heralded the dawn. Then, nine suns blazed brilliantly in the east, their mysterious radiance illuminating the celestial origin. A black crow arrived in flight, bearing a purple writ in its beak, alighting upon the jade portico. Descending through the void, it divinely bestowed the text upon the Celestial Venerable and the Supreme Thearch.

Thereupon, the two lords fasted in the Highest Heaven and reverently recorded the true writ, saying:

*The Jade Pendant and Golden Diadem Scripture of the Great Ultimate Golden Writ, the Treasure Scripture of the Mysterious True Cavern and the Two Radiant Treasures*—its literary splendor rises to the Grand Empyrean, its divine radiance shines throughout the Nine Heavens. Its jade verses illumine wisdom in the Purple Void, its precious tones resound clearly across the rosy ford. The Most High transmitted it to the maidens of pure spirit, the Supreme Perfected bestowed it upon the lads of the purple dawn, each attended by three thousand to guard the sacred writ. Jade maidens scattered blossoms to dispel defilement, purple lads wafted incense to ward off dust. Resplendent lights converged, fragrant smoke ascended in fourfold offering. Auspicious clouds lingered, the Seven Origins infused their essence, the Nine Brilliances shone brightly, celestial perfected arrayed themselves in full. Rivers and seas stilled their waves, the Eight Winds propelled the cosmic wheel. Golden immortals wielded halberds, the Five Thearchs brandished banners. Ten billion winged immortals held pennants and standards, their troops arrayed in myriad coils. Flying dragons and venomous beasts brandished claws upon clouded peaks. Jade trees stirred their flutes, a hundred melodies harmonized. The *gong* and *shang* notes resonated in the void, high and low forming a melody. The Queen of the West struck the rhythm, celestial maidens arrayed their chimes. The Eight Sounds clamored, ethereal echoes filled the celestial encampment. The Twin Sovereigns quickened the tempo, phoenixes danced and simurghs soared. The fourfold *Longhua* dance unfolded, voices united in song. Cloud zithers rang out, startling the Jade Clarity. Flying hymns interwove, the vast music filled the empty court. Mysterious and yellow lights blazed, dense as a net of stars. The Three Treasures intermingled, weaving through the void to encircle the spirit. The myriad perfected rejoiced in harmony, the Three Candles merged their brilliance. Without day or night, eternal celebration filled the celestial expanse.

Thereupon, the Celestial Venerable of Primordial Beginning and the Supreme Thearch swore a golden and azure covenant with heaven, invoking the spirits of the Nine Voids, and received the transmission of the Supreme Perfected. They cast gold into tablets and inscribed the sacred writ, directing the Mother of Tortoises to hold the brush and the Great One to sweep the mat. Enclosed in a cloud-brocade pouch, it was concealed within a verdant and luxuriant coffer, sealed with the Three Origins’ seal of Jade Clarity, and entrusted to the Left Duke of the Immortal Capital and the Feathered Attendant of the Immortal Court, to be stored in the Jade Terrace of Primordial Simplicity and the Feathered Chamber of Mysterious Clouds.

They further commanded three hundred Jade Maidens of the Dragon Flower of the Northern Frigid Golden Terrace and three hundred Jade Lads of the Western Void Jade Palace of the White Void, each to bear incense and hold towels, attending the sacred perfected. According to the statutes of the Supreme Perfected, the scripture shall be transmitted after ten thousand kalpas to those whose bone constitution accords with immortality. Whoever obtains and beholds it shall inscribe their name in the Great Ultimate’s register and present it to the Upper Clarity. Those who lightly divulge or profane it shall be recorded among the infernal officials, punished with the wind-blade, and their seven generations held accountable. How could one not be cautious?

On the first day of the third month of the first year of the *Zhonghuang* era, at the hour when celestial virtue conjoined, the Celestial Venerable descended his teachings within the Yellow Chamber of the Jasper Terrace of the Frigid Numinous Cinnabar Palace. He commanded the Five Elders of the Immortal Capital to unfurl the frost-embroidered cloud-brocade wrapping and open the verdant and luxuriant coffer, revealing *The Jade Pendant and Golden Diadem Hidden Writ of the Grand Empyrean and the Treasure Scripture of the Mysterious True Cavern and the Two Radiant Treasures*. He transmitted it to the Highest Sage, the Jade Dawn Supreme Lord of the Great Dao; the Jade Lads of the Three Heavens; the Queen Mother of the Western Tortoise; the Three Origins Lord of the Purple Clarity and Primordial Simplicity; and the Yellow Venerable of the Center.

The Supreme Thearch transmitted it to the Heavenly Thearch, the Thearch of the Grand Tenuity, the Supreme Prohibition Lord of the Upper Origin of the Southern Culmen, and the Heavenly Thearch of the Golden Watchtower of the Upper Clarity.

At that time, the assembled perfected ascended the Jasper Terrace of the Cavern-Realms in the celestial palace, entering the Jade Chamber within the Golden Flower. They fasted for three months, arraying gold and azure to swear their covenant with the spirits, pledging their cinnabar oath to the Supreme Perfected.

Thereupon, the Lord of the Jade Pendant and the Essence of the Hun, clad in a pearl-embroidered, flowered mantle and a flying brocade azure skirt, a crown of moon and sun adorning his head, held the jade pendant and stood to the left. The Lord of the Golden Diadem and the Spirit of the Po, clad in a purple-embroidered, pearled mantle and a flying gauze crimson skirt, a floral crown of moon and sun adorning his head, held the golden diadem and stood to the right. The two lords, facing the numinous mandate, swore their covenant. Then, azure and white lights blazed brilliantly in the Nine Heavens, their radiance streaming through the Great Void, startling the Four Offices and Five Thearchs of Jade Clarity, the countless hosts of winged immortals. In an instant, they arrived, led by the Jade Lads of the Immortals bearing the Five Thearchs’ numinous inkstones. The assembled immortals took their floating positions, the myriad spirits guarded the portico. The Celestial Lord of Primordial Beginning wore the crown of the Boundless Cavern-Heaven, a mantle of nine-colored *li* silk, a robe of flying frost and pearls, a sash bearing the divine radiance of the sun and the ringing jade of *yuyan*. At his left hip hung the *huoluo*, at his right, the Golden Perfected.

The Grand Thearch wore a crown of seven pearls, draped in a mantle of nine-hued natural cloud-patterned silk, a robe of flying *luo* cloth aglow with radiant feathers. His waistband bore phoenix insignia with flowing gold and fire-bells, and in his hand he held the nine-colored staff of life and demon-subduing. The Nine Elder Immortals of the Celestial Capital raised golden essence tables suspended in the void, upon which rested the sacred writ, to be conferred upon the assembled perfected. Thereupon, the affairs of the numinous covenant were declared complete. Each was attended by three hundred golden immortal youths and maidens of Mount Taihua, who guarded the divine perfected.

Such exalted sages all receive the numinous writ thrice monthly. When the cosmic qi of heaven and earth intermingled at the end of the Three Dynasties, it was transmitted to the seed-people. Those with mystic names inscribed in the Jade Register were listed among the people of the Three Primordial Heavens. Since none of this lineage remains, it is kept secret in the Golden Chamber, and the true writ must not be rashly proclaimed nor the numinous text lightly divulged.

*The Jade Pendant: The Cavern-Flying Treasure Scripture of the Great Empyrean*

The Jade Pendant is wrought from the essence of the nine celestial souls. Above the Nine Heavens, it is called the Morning Lamp; another name is *The Supreme Hidden Mystery: The Cavern-Flying Treasure Chapter*. It resides within the Jade Clarity Palace amid the Great Empyrean, formed from the qi of verdant yang, its emptiness reflecting the Nine Heavens. Its azure light is murky and boundless, illuminating the Three Primordial Terraces. Its color is like green jade, its form like the full moon. Within lies the Hollow Mystery Jade Terrace and the Purple Palace, where the Lord of Soul Essence dwells at the center. The text of *The Jade Pendant: The Hidden Scripture of the Great Empyrean* is inscribed upon the southern portico of the Mystic Terrace.

The Scripture states:
To seek long life, first gather from within your body: the moon’s radiance and essence, the sun’s rosy clouds and flower. Turn the Jade Pendant to the left, grasp the Golden Perfected in the right. The Two Effulgences entwine, the Twin Spirits rest in peace. Ascend to the Great Ultimate, descend to the Ten Directions. Firmly preserve the Mystic True, secure the numinous root. The Mystic Valley’s blossoming infant bathes in the luminous treasure. Rinse with the moon, chew the sun, enter the Gate of Heaven. The Golden Perfected pours upward, the Jade Pendant guards the pass. Azure and white divide clearly, reaching my Mud Pill Palace. The treasure-fluid seals essence, refining the body’s spirit to suppleness. The Three Lords stand guard, clad in cinnabar and crimson skirts, pearl-embroidered flowered mantles, flying brocade azure robes, sashes bearing the moon and holding the sun, heads crowned in purple. Seated in the Hall of Light, shaded by the Seven Origins, the Yellow Court’s *wu* and *ji* block and seal the source of evil. Reverently serve the Two Lads—Wu Ying and Bai Yuan—and the Three Elders of Peach Prosperity, who stand at my Gate of Life. Penetrate the Five Palaces, the Twelve Threads, exhale and inhale through the Six Palaces. The soul rejoices, the po delights, repelling the hundred ailments. Dispel heat and banish cold. The Two Effulgences entwine, the myriad spirits rejoice within. Those who illuminate this text ascend in flight to the Southern Portico. Grasping gold and wearing jade, they enter the Mystic Radiance. The Nine Heavens share in the numinous, the Mystic Mother and the Chamber of Yin harmonize. Yin nurtures, yang guides, their colors bright and countenances fresh. Ranked in the Cinnabar Chamber, their names inscribed in the Thearch’s Palace. Thrice circling, ninefold revolving, they merge with the turning of fate.

This Jade Pendant’s treasure text is the scripture of the Great Ultimate’s Mystic True. Those who cultivate it will all soar through the Great Void, roaming freely through the Nine Clarities. Their white tablets will be recorded, their names inscribed in the Eastern Florescence.

The Queen Mother of the West now engraves this text upon the Kunlun Mountains in the Chamber of the Mystic Garden. None but those of pure and empty nature may glimpse or partake of it.

To ascend the body through the Nine Clarities and feast in the radiance of the Southern Portico, turn the Jade Pendant in the Hall of Light, draw the Golden Perfected to the Mud Pill Palace, summon the soul’s true from the Morning Lamp, and call the flying effulgence from the Lord.

For all who practice this Dao, at evening repose, press both hands upon the heart, close the eyes and inwardly contemplate. Draw the Jade Pendant’s verdant yang qi, its light and color murky and boundless like the full moon, empty and reflecting your form, penetrating your entire being.

The Lord of Soul Essence, surnamed Kaiyuan, personal name *(obscured)*, is nine inches in height. His head bears a purple crown, he wears a pearl-embroidered flowered mantle, a robe of flying brocade azure, a sash bearing the moon and holding the sun. He rides a green crow, descending within the azure light to your form, settling in the Mud Pill Palace.

You should click your teeth nine times, swallow saliva twenty-seven times, and silently intone:
*"Mystic Origin, Supreme Numinous, essence of the Nine Celestial Souls, the Morning Lamp shines brightly, congealing the murky azure qi. Named the Jade Pendant, it illuminates the Great Clarity. Bearing the moon and holding the sun, wielding talismans and grasping bells, its flowered light flows brilliantly, suffusing heaven and earth. Riding the green, controlling wings, with cinnabar shafts and purple chariots, first feasting in the Three Primordials, then descending to my form, settling in the Mud Pill Palace, flowing downward to the Yellow Court. Bind the soul, restrain the po, pacify the myriad spirits. The Five Viscera entwine, the Nine Orifices flourish. The Eight Effulgences soar, ascending into Jade Clarity."*

When finished, rub your hands together until warm, press them to your hairline nine times, wipe your eyes fourteen times, swallow qi three times, then lie down. Thus will the soul be at peace and the po tranquil, the myriad spirits guard the palace, the inner numinous qi secure, the outer source of evil sealed. The Eight Effulgences transform, refining the true into immortality.

After nine years, you will perceive the hidden and obscure, foresee the yet-to-be, sit in death or stand in life, face the divine as an equal. After eighteen years, the Dao will be perfected and the true will descend, enabling flight to the Highest Clarity. Without this method, the Three Hun will not be guarded, the Seven Po will not be at peace. The Three Corpses will take flight, the Nine Worms will flee in alarm, attacking within the body, evil spirits penetrating essence. Qi scatters, spirit departs, the body remains impure. In vain you swallow saliva, wasting qi and losing the numinous.

Those who attain this Dao and perfect long life must treasure and secretly cultivate it, for how could their fate be overturned?

*The Secret Inner Names of the Nine True Treasure Spirits Born of the Three Primordials and Nine Heavens*

The Upper Primordial’s Upper True Unity Lord, surnamed *(obscured)*, personal name *(obscured)*, style *Dixian*, is three inches and two *fen* in height. His head bears a black-light purple yang turban, wears a crown of the Nine Origins’ flying essence. He is clad in a nine-hued seamless crimson brocade unlined robe, a waistband of nine-colored sashes, and the Dragon Abyss Life-Immortal Sword. Sometimes he divides one form into nine heads, holding the Jade Pendant’s *Kaiyang* talisman. Wearing the sun and treading the moon, he sits within your Mud Pill Palace.

The Upper Primordial’s Middle True Unity Lord, surnamed *(obscured)*, personal name *Kaikai*, style *Chixuan*, is five inches and two *fen* in height. His head bears a five-colored purple yang turban, wears a crown of the Mystic Origin’s Boundless. He is clad in a five-hued seamless yellow brocade patterned robe, a waistband of seven-colored sashes, and the Dragon Abyss Life-Immortal Sword.

At times, he divides his form into a phoenix, holding the Jade Pendant’s *Yangming* talisman, wearing the moon and bearing the sun in his mouth, seated within your Upper Primordial’s Hall of Brightness.

The Upper Primordial’s Lower True Unity Lord, surnamed *(obscured)*, personal name *(obscured)*, style *Yuanshan*, is three inches and two *fen* in height. His head bears a penetrating-essence purple yang turban, wears a crown of the Nine Qi’s Boundless. He is clad in a seven-hued seamless azure brocade patterned robe, a waistband of seven-colored sashes, and the Dragon Abyss Life-Immortal Sword. At times, he divides his form into a human-headed raven-bodied figure, holding the *Shiyang* talisman, wearing the sun and bearing the moon, seated within your Upper Cinnabar Field Palace.

The Middle Primordial’s Upper True Unity Lord, surnamed *(obscured)*, personal name *(obscured)*, style *Shangzhen*, is three inches and two *fen* in height. His head bears a black-light boundless great yang turban, wears a crown of the Nine Origins’ penetrating dawn. He is clad in a seven-hued vermilion jade flying brocade patterned robe, a waistband of seven-colored sashes, and the Demon-Quelling Sword of Immortal Summoning. At times, he transforms into nine figures, holding the *Taiyang* talisman, girded with the moon and bearing the sun, seated within your Middle Primordial’s Cavern Yang Palace.

The Middle Primordial’s Middle True Unity Lord, surnamed *(obscured)*, personal name *(obscured)*, style *Guangming*, is three inches and two *fen* in height. His head bears a seven-colored purple yang turban, wears a crown of the Heaven-Penetrating Precious Dawn. He is clad in a seven-hued crimson patterned unlined robe, a waistband of five-colored purple sashes, and the Dragon Immortal Sword. At times, he transforms into a human-bodied raven-headed figure, holding the *Shangyang* talisman, girded with the sun and bearing the moon, seated within your Middle Primordial’s Crimson Palace.

The Middle Primordial’s Lower True Unity Lord, surnamed *(obscured)*, personal name *(obscured)*, style *Xuandan*, is three inches and two *fen* in height. His head bears a seven-luminaries purple yang turban, wears a crown of the Primordial’s Heaven-Penetrating. He is clad in a seven-hued flying brocade patterned robe, a waistband of five-colored purple sashes, and the Dragon Abyss Sword. At times, he transforms into a raven-bodied human-headed figure, holding the *Yuanyang* talisman, wearing the sun and seated upon the moon, dwelling within your Middle Cinnabar Field Palace.

The Lower Primordial’s Upper True Unity Lord, surnamed *(obscured)*, personal name *(obscured)*, style *Yingzhi*, is three inches and two *fen* in height. His head bears a five-colored yang brightness turban, wears a crown of the Nine Origins’ radiant dawn. He is clad in a five-qi longevity patterned robe, a waistband of five-colored sashes, and the Life-Commanding Sword. At times, he transforms into five figures, holding the *Zhengyang* talisman, grasping the sun in his left hand and the moon in his right, seated within your Lower Primordial’s Mystic Valley Palace.

The Lower Primordial’s Middle True Unity Lord, surnamed *(obscured)*, personal name *(obscured)*, style *Xuanquan*, is three inches and two *fen* in height. His head bears a seven-colored purple yang turban, wears a crown of the Heaven-Soaring. He is clad in a nine-hued black brocade flying robe, a waistband of nine-colored sashes, and the Dragon Abyss Sword. At times, he transforms into a single body with five heads, holding the *Tongyang* talisman, grasping the sun in his left hand and the moon in his right, seated within your Lower Primordial’s Palace of Ultimate Yin.

The Lower Primordial’s Lower True Unity Lord, surnamed *(obscured)*, personal name *(obscured)*, style *Yangsheng*, is three inches and two *fen* in height. His head bears a seven-colored purple yang turban, wears a crown of the Nine Origins’ Boundless. He is clad in a jade-beaded crimson patterned unlined robe, a waistband of nine-colored sashes, and the Ascension Sword. At times, he transforms into the form of a yang-infused infant, dwelling within the Cinnabar Field, holding the *Mengyang* talisman, wearing the moon and embracing the sun, seated within your Lower Cinnabar Field Palace.

The True Unity’s inner spirits transform through the Three Primordials, dividing their qi into nine figures, settling and guarding the Three Palaces—thus each palace has its Three Lords. All are the primal qi of the Jade Treasure of the True Sovereign, born at the inception of the Nine Heavens, coalescing into human form, receiving their names from the Jade Void.

Above, they dwell in the Nine Heavens’ highest realm, beneath the nine-tiered canopy of the Jade Clarity Palace; in the middle, they roam the subtle expanse of the Great Void; below, they govern the Three Palaces within the human body. Without the Three True Ones, the Jade Void would not be clear, the Nine Heavens would not shine, and the Three Luminaries would not glow. Without the Three True Ones in the Great Void, Heaven would have no means to float in emptiness, the Nine Mysteries would have no means to form clouds, the Three Caverns would have no means to attain subtlety, and the Five Peaks would have no means to produce immortals. Without the Three True Ones in the human body, the Three Palaces would lie abandoned, the myriad spirits would scatter, qi would disperse and the true would depart, the Red Child would be disturbed and lost, the Three Corpses would vie for dominance, and the Nine Worms would assail the mind.

Those who know this secret align their truth with the Three Treasures. Its method is profound and weighty—it must not be recklessly disclosed. Unless one ascends the altar, pledges to the spirits, and swears an oath to the Nine Heavens, the sacred names must not be revealed. To transmit it lightly to the unworthy brings retribution upon the errant soul: seven generations of ancestors suffer in the Three Paths, endure the Five Torments upon the Knife Mountain, while the self perishes beneath the Wind Blade, expiating sins at the River Source.

Those who possess the Golden Name and the Imperial Chart, inscribed in the Jade Clarity, having received this secret, must cultivate it in silence. By contemplating it day and night, within three years, the true form will descend, and one will naturally ascend in flight.

The *Taiyi Golden Writ*’s secret characters of the Three Primordials and Nine True Yang Talismans:
The *Chan Shan Yuan Liang Shou Tian Hun Jing*’s secret sound, the inner taboo name of the Jade Pendant’s *Yang Peng* talisman, embodies the boundless Heaven’s *Kaiyang* qi. It governs the Mud Pill Palace’s upper true inner spirits. Inscribe it in green on white silk and wear it; also write it on white paper and ingest it on one’s life-destiny day and the eight solar terms. Meditate inwardly upon the Mud Pill Palace’s upper true spirit—after three years, one will behold the true form, the Imperial Lord will descend, the Eight Sceneries will transform, and the body will ascend.

The supreme *Chan Shan Wuliang Shou Tian Hun Jing*’s secret sound, the inner taboo name of the Jade Pendant’s *Yang Peng* talisman, embodies the supreme *Chan Shan*’s boundless longevity Heaven’s *Yangming* qi. It governs the Hall of Brightness’s middle true inner spirits. Inscribe it in green on white silk and wear it; also write it on white paper and ingest it on one’s life-destiny day and the eight solar terms. Meditate inwardly upon the Hall of Brightness’s middle true spirit—after three years, one will behold the true form and know the Nine Heavens’ celestial sounds, obtaining the Nine Heavens’ scriptures. The Imperial Lord will descend, the Eight Sceneries will lift the body, ascending above the Nine Heavens.

The *Fan Jian Tian Hun Jing*’s secret sound, the inner taboo name of the Jade Pendant’s *Shiyang* talisman, embodies the *Fan Jian* Heaven’s *Shiyang* qi. It governs the Upper Cinnabar Field’s lower true inner spirits.

Inscribe it in green on white silk and wear it; also write it on white paper and ingest it on one’s life-destiny day and the eight solar terms. Meditate inwardly upon the Cinnabar Field’s middle true inner spirit—after three years, one will behold the true form and the Nine Heavens’ Chancellor, whose name is recorded in the Nine Heavens’ register. One will meet the Nine Heavens’ Celestial Parents, the Imperial Lord will descend in form, the Eight Sceneries will lift the body in flight, ascending to the Jade Purity.

The three superior departments govern the Upper Three Heavens, presiding over the Upper Cinnabar Field, the Hall of Brightness, and the Mud-Pill Palace. Meditating upon them, one will instantly summon nine-colored dragons, bearing the moon and holding the sun in their mouths, their radiance resplendent and luminous, their nine-colored dark-yellow glow illuminating the entire body.

The *Doushu* Heaven’s secret sound, the inner taboo name of the Jade Pendant’s *Taiyang* talisman, embodies the *Doushu* Heaven’s *Taiyang* qi. It governs the Upper True inner spirits of the Cavern-Yang Palace. Inscribe it in vermilion on white silk and wear it; also write it on white paper and ingest it on one’s life-destiny day and the eight solar terms. Meditate inwardly upon the Cavern-Yang’s Upper True spirit—after three years without interruption, one will behold the true form of the five-headed, one-bodied inner spirit. The Nine Heavens will record one’s name, the Southern Terrace’s Imperial Lord will descend to one’s bedchamber, refining the hun-soul and restraining the po-soul, transforming the Eight Sceneries’ spirits. After eighteen years, one’s form will soar through the Nine Empyreans, ascending to the Jade Dawn.

The *Bujiaole* Heaven’s secret sound, the inner taboo name of the Jade Pendant’s *Shangyang* talisman, embodies the *Bujiaole* Heaven’s *Shangyang* qi. It governs the middle true inner spirits of the Crimson Palace. Inscribe it in vermilion on white silk and wear it; also write it on white paper and ingest it on one’s life-destiny day and the eight solar terms. Meditate inwardly upon the Crimson Palace’s middle true spirit—after three years without interruption, one will see the true form, or behold a nine-headed spirit in human form. It will bestow upon the practitioner a cinnabar-jade tablet, inscribing the title of Southern Marchmount Master, recording the myriad qi and consolidating the spirit’s precious truth. After eighteen years, the Three Primes will descend, welcoming the practitioner with a flying wheel to ascend the gates of the Nine Heavens.

The *Huayingsheng* Heaven’s secret sound, the inner taboo name of the Jade Pendant’s *Yuanyang* talisman, embodies the *Huayingsheng* Heaven’s *Yuanyang* qi. It governs the lower true inner spirits of the Middle Cinnabar Field Palace. Inscribe it in vermilion on white silk and wear it; also write it on white paper and ingest it on one’s life-destiny day and the eight solar terms. Meditate inwardly upon the Cinnabar Field’s lower true spirit—after three years without interruption, one will see the true form, the Nine Heavens’ Chancellor will record one’s name in the Nine Heavens’ register, and one’s lifespan will share the same duration as the Nine Heavens. The heart will generate purple networks, the face will emit golden light, and the spirit-lamp’s dark radiance will illuminate the five viscera within, with all spirits fully present, the entire body attaining immortality.

The three superior departments govern the Middle Three Heavens, presiding over the Cavern-Yang, the Crimson Palace, and the Cinnabar Field Palace. Meditating upon them, one will instantly summon nine-colored vermilion phoenixes, holding the sun’s essence in their mouths, their five-colored radiant light flowing and shining within the entire form.

The *Fanmojiayi* Heaven’s secret sound, the inner taboo name of the Jade Pendant’s *Zhengyang* talisman, embodies the *Fanmojiayi* Heaven’s *Zhengyang* qi. It governs the Upper True inner spirits of the Mystic Valley Palace. Inscribe it in yellow on white silk and wear it; also write it on white paper and ingest it on one’s life-destiny day and the eight solar terms. Meditate inwardly upon the Mystic Valley Palace’s Upper True spirit—after three years of careful determination, one will clearly see the true form, behold the Nine Heavens above, and hear the Nine Heavens’ celestial sounds. The Imperial Lord will descend and bestow the true scriptures. After eighteen years, one will ride the Eight Sceneries’ cloud chariot, flying to the Upper Clarity.

The *Fanbao* Heaven’s secret sound, the inner taboo name of the Jade Pendant’s *Tongyang* talisman, embodies the *Fanbao* Heaven’s *Tongyang* qi. It governs the middle true inner spirits of the Ultimate-Yin Palace. Inscribe it in yellow on white silk and wear it; also write it on white paper and ingest it on one’s life-destiny day and the eight solar terms. Meditate inwardly upon the Ultimate-Yin Palace’s middle true spirit—after three years of careful determination, one will clearly see the true spirit. The Nine Heavens’ Mystic Mother will bestow the Nine Heavens’ scriptures, the Eightfold-Refined Mushroom Essence, attaining the natural Dao, ascending to the heavens in broad daylight, and rising to the *Parinirvāṇa*.

The *Poliheshou* Heaven’s secret sound, the inner taboo name of the Jade Pendant’s *Mengyang* talisman, embodies the *Poliheshou* Heaven’s *Mengyang* qi. It governs the lower true inner spirits of the Cinnabar Field Palace below the navel. chunks.original_text: 太上玉佩金珰太极金书上经 经名：太上玉佩金珰太极金书上经。 又称《玉佩金珰太霄隐书玄真洞飞二景宝经》。 撰人不详，约出於东晋。 系早期上清派重要经典。 原本一卷五篇，后分作两种经文。 底本出处：《正统道藏》洞真部本文类。 参校本：敦煌P.2409号残写本。 太上玉佩金珰太极金书上经 上灵元年正月一日，六元合庆，甲子直辰，元始天王与太帝君，共乘碧霞流飙紫辈，上登九玄之崖无色之端，徘徊洞天，逍遥极元，流盻纵体，适意浮轮，睹二仪以剖判，观大化以长存，俯上任於帝位，欣我道而欢焉，推历运以改度，悟季生以转轮，祈灵瑞於太空，讲上法於九天，启誓告灵、清斋霄庭。 是日忽天光昏翳，日月昼冥，八炁回谢，七元隐精，玄象冥滞，万真奔灵，三日三夜，碧鸡启晨。 时有九日焕明东方，玄光朗耀天元，复有青乌来翔，口衔紫书，集于玉轩，飞空下降，玄授天王、太帝二君。 於是二君对斋高天，奉制真文记曰： 玉佩金珰太极金书，玄真洞飞二景宝经，文彩郁乎太霄，神光焕乎九天，玉章洞慧於紫虚，宝音逸朗於霞津。 高上传以素灵之女，太真赠以紫晨之童，各三千人侍卫神文。 玉女散花以却秽，紫童翻香以禳尘，华光交会，四集奏烟，庆云徘徊，七元灌精，九晖映朗，天真敷陈，河海静波，八风扬轮，金仙秉钺，五帝仗旛，飞仙羽骑十亿万人，执麾建节，罗兵万缠，飞龙毒兽，奋爪云岑，玉树激籁，百咏互吟，宫商空和，高下成音，西妃击节，天女罗铮，八音嘈囐，逸响云营，双皇促节，鸾舞凤翔，龙华四折，合唱齐声，云璈激朗，倾骇玉清，飞歌互奏，广乐虚庭，玄黄焕铄，郁若罗星，三宝交扇，结空绕灵，万真咸畅，三烛合明，无昼无夜，长庆云陈。 於是，元始天王、太帝二君，以金青盟天，告灵九空，禀受上真。 铸金为简，刻书灵文，使龟母按笔，太一拂筵，盛以云锦之囊，秘於郁森之笈，封以玉清三元之章，付仙都左公侍仙羽郎，藏太素瑶台玄云羽室。 又命北寒金台龙华玉女、白空虞宫西灵玉童，各三百人，典香执巾，侍卫灵真。 依太真之科，万劫当传骨相合仙之人。 有得见者，太极书名，奏之上清。 轻泄漏慢，下名鬼官，罚以风刀，七祖充责，可不慎焉。 至中皇元年三月一日庚寅，天德值合之时，元始下教於寒灵丹殿琼台黄房之内，命五老仙都披霜罗云锦之报，郁森之笈，出玉佩金珰太霄隐书，玄真洞飞二景宝经，以传高圣玉晨太上大道君、三天玉童、西龟王母、紫清太素三元君、中央黄老君。 太帝君以传天帝君、太微帝君、南极上元禁君、皇天上清金阙帝君。 是时众真登太空琼台洞真之殿，处乎玉房金华之内，清斋三月，列金青以誓灵，告丹盟乎上真。 於是玉佩魂精帝君，披珠绣华帔飞锦青裙，带月衔日首建紫冠，执玉佩立左； 金珰魄灵帝君，披紫绣珠帔飞罗丹裙，带月衔日首建华冠，执金珰立右。 二君当命灵告盟，因有青白二光，焕烂九天，流曜太空，骇动玉清四司五帝、飞仙羽骑巨亿之众，鲦欻立到，领仙玉郎执五帝灵磨，群仙浮位，万灵卫轩。 元始天主建无极洞天之冠，披九色离罗之帔、飞森霜珠之袍，带神光日铃育延之剑，左佩豁落，右佩金真。

**The Supreme Jade Pendant and Golden Diadem Scripture of the Great Ultimate Golden Writ (Upper Volume)**

**Scripture Title:** *The Supreme Jade Pendant and Golden Diadem Scripture of the Great Ultimate Golden Writ (Upper Volume)*. Also known as *The Jade Pendant and Golden Diadem Hidden Writ of the Grand Empyrean and Mysterious True Cavern of the Two Radiant Treasures*.

Author unknown, approximately composed during the Eastern Jin dynasty. A foundational scripture of the early Shangqing tradition. Originally a single scroll in five chapters, later divided into two separate texts.

**Source Text:** *Daoist Canon of the Zhengtong Era*, *Dongzhen* section, *Benwen* category.
**Collated with:** Dunhuang manuscript P.2409 (fragmentary copy).

---

**The Supreme Jade Pendant and Golden Diadem Scripture of the Great Ultimate Golden Writ (Upper Volume)**

On the first day of the first month of the first year of the *Shangling* era, as the Six Origins conjoined in celebration and the cyclical sign *jiazi* governed the dawn, the Celestial Venerable of Primordial Beginning and the Supreme Thearch ascended together upon azure mists and purple auroras, mounting the Nine Profound’s precipice at the formless summit. They wandered the cavern-heavens, roamed the ultimate origin, their gazes sweeping freely, their forms at ease upon the floating wheel. Beholding the Two Modes as they divided, observing the great transformation enduring forever, they looked down upon the imperial throne and rejoiced in the Dao, delighting therein. Surveying the revolutions of time to alter the cosmic measures, they awakened to the turning of the kalpa’s wheel, entreating auspicious omens from the Great Void, expounding the supreme Dharma in the Nine Heavens. They initiated the sacred covenant, purified the altar, and fasted in the Empyrean Court.

On that day, the celestial light suddenly dimmed, sun and moon darkened at noon, the Eight Qi receded, the Seven Origins concealed their essence, the mysterious constellations stagnated, and the myriad perfected fled in spirit. For three days and nights, the azure fowl heralded the dawn. Then, nine suns blazed brilliantly in the east, their mysterious radiance illuminating the celestial origin. A black crow arrived in flight, bearing a purple writ in its beak, alighting upon the jade portico. Descending through the void, it divinely bestowed the text upon the Celestial Venerable and the Supreme Thearch.

Thereupon, the two lords fasted in the Highest Heaven and reverently recorded the true writ, saying:

*The Jade Pendant and Golden Diadem Scripture of the Great Ultimate Golden Writ, the Treasure Scripture of the Mysterious True Cavern and the Two Radiant Treasures*—its literary splendor rises to the Grand Empyrean, its divine radiance shines throughout the Nine Heavens. Its jade verses illumine wisdom in the Purple Void, its precious tones resound clearly across the rosy ford. The Most High transmitted it to the maidens of pure spirit, the Supreme Perfected bestowed it upon the lads of the purple dawn, each attended by three thousand to guard the sacred writ. Jade maidens scattered blossoms to dispel defilement, purple lads wafted incense to ward off dust. Resplendent lights converged, fragrant smoke ascended in fourfold offering. Auspicious clouds lingered, the Seven Origins infused their essence, the Nine Brilliances shone brightly, celestial perfected arrayed themselves in full. Rivers and seas stilled their waves, the Eight Winds propelled the cosmic wheel. Golden immortals wielded halberds, the Five Thearchs brandished banners. Ten billion winged immortals held pennants and standards, their troops arrayed in myriad coils. Flying dragons and venomous beasts brandished claws upon clouded peaks. Jade trees stirred their flutes, a hundred melodies harmonized. The *gong* and *shang* notes resonated in the void, high and low forming a melody. The Queen of the West struck the rhythm, celestial maidens arrayed their chimes. The Eight Sounds clamored, ethereal echoes filled the celestial encampment. The Twin Sovereigns quickened the tempo, phoenixes danced and simurghs soared. The fourfold *Longhua* dance unfolded, voices united in song. Cloud zithers rang out, startling the Jade Clarity. Flying hymns interwove, the vast music filled the empty court. Mysterious and yellow lights blazed, dense as a net of stars. The Three Treasures intermingled, weaving through the void to encircle the spirit. The myriad perfected rejoiced in harmony, the Three Candles merged their brilliance. Without day or night, eternal celebration filled the celestial expanse.

Thereupon, the Celestial Venerable of Primordial Beginning and the Supreme Thearch swore a golden and azure covenant with heaven, invoking the spirits of the Nine Voids, and received the transmission of the Supreme Perfected. They cast gold into tablets and inscribed the sacred writ, directing the Mother of Tortoises to hold the brush and the Great One to sweep the mat. Enclosed in a cloud-brocade pouch, it was concealed within a verdant and luxuriant coffer, sealed with the Three Origins’ seal of Jade Clarity, and entrusted to the Left Duke of the Immortal Capital and the Feathered Attendant of the Immortal Court, to be stored in the Jade Terrace of Primordial Simplicity and the Feathered Chamber of Mysterious Clouds.

They further commanded three hundred Jade Maidens of the Dragon Flower of the Northern Frigid Golden Terrace and three hundred Jade Lads of the Western Void Jade Palace of the White Void, each to bear incense and hold towels, attending the sacred perfected. According to the statutes of the Supreme Perfected, the scripture shall be transmitted after ten thousand kalpas to those whose bone constitution accords with immortality. Whoever obtains and beholds it shall inscribe their name in the Great Ultimate’s register and present it to the Upper Clarity. Those who lightly divulge or profane it shall be recorded among the infernal officials, punished with the wind-blade, and their seven generations held accountable. How could one not be cautious?

On the first day of the third month of the first year of the *Zhonghuang* era, at the hour when celestial virtue conjoined, the Celestial Venerable descended his teachings within the Yellow Chamber of the Jasper Terrace of the Frigid Numinous Cinnabar Palace. He commanded the Five Elders of the Immortal Capital to unfurl the frost-embroidered cloud-brocade wrapping and open the verdant and luxuriant coffer, revealing *The Jade Pendant and Golden Diadem Hidden Writ of the Grand Empyrean and the Treasure Scripture of the Mysterious True Cavern and the Two Radiant Treasures*. He transmitted it to the Highest Sage, the Jade Dawn Supreme Lord of the Great Dao; the Jade Lads of the Three Heavens; the Queen Mother of the Western Tortoise; the Three Origins Lord of the Purple Clarity and Primordial Simplicity; and the Yellow Venerable of the Center.

The Supreme Thearch transmitted it to the Heavenly Thearch, the Thearch of the Grand Tenuity, the Supreme Prohibition Lord of the Upper Origin of the Southern Culmen, and the Heavenly Thearch of the Golden Watchtower of the Upper Clarity.

At that time, the assembled perfected ascended the Jasper Terrace of the Cavern-Realms in the celestial palace, entering the Jade Chamber within the Golden Flower. They fasted for three months, arraying gold and azure to swear their covenant with the spirits, pledging their cinnabar oath to the Supreme Perfected.

Thereupon, the Lord of the Jade Pendant and the Essence of the Hun, clad in a pearl-embroidered, flowered mantle and a flying brocade azure skirt, a crown of moon and sun adorning his head, held the jade pendant and stood to the left. The Lord of the Golden Diadem and the Spirit of the Po, clad in a purple-embroidered, pearled mantle and a flying gauze crimson skirt, a floral crown of moon and sun adorning his head, held the golden diadem and stood to the right. The two lords, facing the numinous mandate, swore their covenant. Then, azure and white lights blazed brilliantly in the Nine Heavens, their radiance streaming through the Great Void, startling the Four Offices and Five Thearchs of Jade Clarity, the countless hosts of winged immortals. In an instant, they arrived, led by the Jade Lads of the Immortals bearing the Five Thearchs’ numinous inkstones. The assembled immortals took their floating positions, the myriad spirits guarded the portico. The Celestial Lord of Primordial Beginning wore the crown of the Boundless Cavern-Heaven, a mantle of nine-colored *li* silk, a robe of flying frost and pearls, a sash bearing the divine radiance of the sun and the ringing jade of *yuyan*. At his left hip hung the *huoluo*, at his right, the Golden Perfected.

chunks.original_text: 太帝君建七珠冠，披九色自然云文之帔、飞罗耀光羽袍，腰带凤章流金火铃，手执命魔九色之节。 九老仙都擎持金精立空之案，上承宝文，以授众真中於是告灵事悉，各以金仙之童、太华之女各三百人，侍卫神真。 如是高圣，皆月三朝灵文。 运至三代之末，天地气交，当传种民，有玄名玉籍，列图三元天之人。 自无此挺，秘之金房，不得妄宣真，轻泄灵文也。 玉佩太霄隐书洞飞宝经 玉佩以九天魂精，九天之上名曰晨灯，一曰太上隐玄洞飞宝章。 处於玉清之馆太霄之中，结青阳之气，虚映九天，青光沌沌，洞照三元之台，色如青玉，形如月圆。 内有空玄玉台紫殿，则魂精帝君处在中央，太霄隐书玉佩玄台南轩之文。 经曰： 欲求长生，宜先取诸身，月华月精，日霞日英，左回玉佩，右把金珰，二景缠绵，双神安康，上行太极，下造十方，坚存玄真，保固灵根，玄谷华婴，灌映沈珍，漱月咀日，以入天门，金珰仰注，玉佩执关，青白分明，适我泥丸，宝液闭精，炼柔身神，三君备卫，丹绛之裙，珠绣华帔，飞锦青裙，带月衔日，首建紫冠，安坐明堂，荫以七元，黄庭戊己，塞镇邪源，恭司二子，无英白元，桃康三老，当我生门，通彻五府，十二之纶，吐纳六宫，魂庆魄欣，却此百痾，辟热除寒，二景缠络，万神内欢，有明其文，飞升南轩，把金佩玉，入景玄光，九天同灵，玄母齐房，阴哺阳导，明色鲜容，位列丹室，名题帝宫，三周九度，与运混同。 此玉佩宝文，太极玄真之经也。 能修之者，皆飞行太虚，逸遨九清，白简结录，东华书名。 西王母今刻书此文，於昆仑之山玄圃之室，自非清虚之质，不得窥参。 夫欲腾身九清，宴景南轩，回玉佩於明堂，引金珰於泥丸，降魂真於晨灯，招飞景於帝君。 凡行此道，常以暮卧，两手抚心，闭目内思，引玉佩青阳之气，光色沌沌，如月之圆，虚映兆身，洞达一形。 魂精帝君，姓开元，讳(门十行)明，形长九寸，头建紫冠，披珠绣华帔，衣飞锦青裙，带月衔日，乘御青乌，在青光之中，下降兆身二安镇泥丸。 兆当叩齿九通，咽液二十七过，阴祝曰： 玄元太灵，九天魂精，晨灯朗映，结气沌青，号曰玉佩，洞曜太明，带月衔日，建符执铃，华光流焕，普天郁冥，乘青控翮，丹辕紫軿，先宴三元，回降我形，镇在泥丸,下流黄庭，检魂束魄万神安宁，五脏结络，九穴华荣，八景腾飞，升入玉清。 毕，以两手相摩令热，按额发际九过，拭目二七过，咽气三过止，便卧。 如此则魂安魄宁，万神镇宫，内固灵气，外塞邪源，八景变化，炼真变仙。 九年，克能洞睹幽冥，逆究未然，坐在立亡，与神对颜。 一十八年，道成真降，飞行上清。 学无此法，则三魂不守，七魄不宁，三尸飞翔，九虫奔惊，攻伐形内，来邪通精，气散神逝，体不洁清，徒劳咽液，损气丧灵。 有得此道，克成长生，宝慎密修，命胡可倾。 九天化生三元九真宝神内讳 上元上真一君姓，讳，字帝先，形长三寸二分，头建玄光紫阳之帻，戴九元飞精之冠，衣九色无缝绛锦单衣，腰带九色之绶龙渊命仙之剑。 或分一形为九头，手执玉佩开阳之符，戴日履月，坐兆泥丸宫中。 上元中真一君，姓，讳开，字赤玄，形长五寸二分，头建五色紫阳之帻，戴玄元无极之冠，衣五色无缝黄锦章衣，腰带七色之绶龙渊命仙之剑。

The Grand Thearch wore a crown of seven pearls, draped in a mantle of nine-hued natural cloud-patterned silk, a robe of flying *luo* cloth aglow with radiant feathers. His waistband bore phoenix insignia with flowing gold and fire-bells, and in his hand he held the nine-colored staff of life and demon-subduing. The Nine Elder Immortals of the Celestial Capital raised golden essence tables suspended in the void, upon which rested the sacred writ, to be conferred upon the assembled perfected. Thereupon, the affairs of the numinous covenant were declared complete. Each was attended by three hundred golden immortal youths and maidens of Mount Taihua, who guarded the divine perfected.

Such exalted sages all receive the numinous writ thrice monthly. When the cosmic qi of heaven and earth intermingled at the end of the Three Dynasties, it was transmitted to the seed-people. Those with mystic names inscribed in the Jade Register were listed among the people of the Three Primordial Heavens. Since none of this lineage remains, it is kept secret in the Golden Chamber, and the true writ must not be rashly proclaimed nor the numinous text lightly divulged.

*The Jade Pendant: The Cavern-Flying Treasure Scripture of the Great Empyrean*

The Jade Pendant is wrought from the essence of the nine celestial souls. Above the Nine Heavens, it is called the Morning Lamp; another name is *The Supreme Hidden Mystery: The Cavern-Flying Treasure Chapter*. It resides within the Jade Clarity Palace amid the Great Empyrean, formed from the qi of verdant yang, its emptiness reflecting the Nine Heavens. Its azure light is murky and boundless, illuminating the Three Primordial Terraces. Its color is like green jade, its form like the full moon. Within lies the Hollow Mystery Jade Terrace and the Purple Palace, where the Lord of Soul Essence dwells at the center. The text of *The Jade Pendant: The Hidden Scripture of the Great Empyrean* is inscribed upon the southern portico of the Mystic Terrace.

The Scripture states:
To seek long life, first gather from within your body: the moon’s radiance and essence, the sun’s rosy clouds and flower. Turn the Jade Pendant to the left, grasp the Golden Perfected in the right. The Two Effulgences entwine, the Twin Spirits rest in peace. Ascend to the Great Ultimate, descend to the Ten Directions. Firmly preserve the Mystic True, secure the numinous root. The Mystic Valley’s blossoming infant bathes in the luminous treasure. Rinse with the moon, chew the sun, enter the Gate of Heaven. The Golden Perfected pours upward, the Jade Pendant guards the pass. Azure and white divide clearly, reaching my Mud Pill Palace. The treasure-fluid seals essence, refining the body’s spirit to suppleness. The Three Lords stand guard, clad in cinnabar and crimson skirts, pearl-embroidered flowered mantles, flying brocade azure robes, sashes bearing the moon and holding the sun, heads crowned in purple. Seated in the Hall of Light, shaded by the Seven Origins, the Yellow Court’s *wu* and *ji* block and seal the source of evil. Reverently serve the Two Lads—Wu Ying and Bai Yuan—and the Three Elders of Peach Prosperity, who stand at my Gate of Life. Penetrate the Five Palaces, the Twelve Threads, exhale and inhale through the Six Palaces. The soul rejoices, the po delights, repelling the hundred ailments. Dispel heat and banish cold. The Two Effulgences entwine, the myriad spirits rejoice within. Those who illuminate this text ascend in flight to the Southern Portico. Grasping gold and wearing jade, they enter the Mystic Radiance. The Nine Heavens share in the numinous, the Mystic Mother and the Chamber of Yin harmonize. Yin nurtures, yang guides, their colors bright and countenances fresh. Ranked in the Cinnabar Chamber, their names inscribed in the Thearch’s Palace. Thrice circling, ninefold revolving, they merge with the turning of fate.

This Jade Pendant’s treasure text is the scripture of the Great Ultimate’s Mystic True. Those who cultivate it will all soar through the Great Void, roaming freely through the Nine Clarities. Their white tablets will be recorded, their names inscribed in the Eastern Florescence.

The Queen Mother of the West now engraves this text upon the Kunlun Mountains in the Chamber of the Mystic Garden. None but those of pure and empty nature may glimpse or partake of it.

To ascend the body through the Nine Clarities and feast in the radiance of the Southern Portico, turn the Jade Pendant in the Hall of Light, draw the Golden Perfected to the Mud Pill Palace, summon the soul’s true from the Morning Lamp, and call the flying effulgence from the Lord.

For all who practice this Dao, at evening repose, press both hands upon the heart, close the eyes and inwardly contemplate. Draw the Jade Pendant’s verdant yang qi, its light and color murky and boundless like the full moon, empty and reflecting your form, penetrating your entire being.

The Lord of Soul Essence, surnamed Kaiyuan, personal name *(obscured)*, is nine inches in height. His head bears a purple crown, he wears a pearl-embroidered flowered mantle, a robe of flying brocade azure, a sash bearing the moon and holding the sun. He rides a green crow, descending within the azure light to your form, settling in the Mud Pill Palace.

You should click your teeth nine times, swallow saliva twenty-seven times, and silently intone:
*"Mystic Origin, Supreme Numinous, essence of the Nine Celestial Souls, the Morning Lamp shines brightly, congealing the murky azure qi. Named the Jade Pendant, it illuminates the Great Clarity. Bearing the moon and holding the sun, wielding talismans and grasping bells, its flowered light flows brilliantly, suffusing heaven and earth. Riding the green, controlling wings, with cinnabar shafts and purple chariots, first feasting in the Three Primordials, then descending to my form, settling in the Mud Pill Palace, flowing downward to the Yellow Court. Bind the soul, restrain the po, pacify the myriad spirits. The Five Viscera entwine, the Nine Orifices flourish. The Eight Effulgences soar, ascending into Jade Clarity."*

When finished, rub your hands together until warm, press them to your hairline nine times, wipe your eyes fourteen times, swallow qi three times, then lie down. Thus will the soul be at peace and the po tranquil, the myriad spirits guard the palace, the inner numinous qi secure, the outer source of evil sealed. The Eight Effulgences transform, refining the true into immortality.

After nine years, you will perceive the hidden and obscure, foresee the yet-to-be, sit in death or stand in life, face the divine as an equal. After eighteen years, the Dao will be perfected and the true will descend, enabling flight to the Highest Clarity. Without this method, the Three Hun will not be guarded, the Seven Po will not be at peace. The Three Corpses will take flight, the Nine Worms will flee in alarm, attacking within the body, evil spirits penetrating essence. Qi scatters, spirit departs, the body remains impure. In vain you swallow saliva, wasting qi and losing the numinous.

chunks.original_text: 朝礼九天魂魄帝君求仙上法 常以月三日、九日、十六日平旦，向日九拜九揖，亦可心拜，仰头叩齿二十四通，微祝曰： 天魂九缠，上帝尊神，太阳日精，金门变仙，小兆某甲，敢奏微言，今日上告，八愿开陈，请施礼愿，仰希玄恩，苍龙朱凤，策舆紫轩，五云交荫，六气扇尘，高上曲胯，三光降真，二景缠络，我道欣欣，心朗耳聪，目明色鲜，体轻骨升，面发华颜，羽服生形，飞造帝晨。 毕，仰天引日精四十五咽止。 行些三年，目明彻视，洞睹无穷，面有金容，体生玉津。 九年能行，身外无影，飞空玄虚也。 若天阴无日，於密室心存行之，亦感於自然也。 又以月五日、十五日、二十五日，此三日皆人定，向月九拜九揖，亦可心拜，仰向月，叩齿十六通，祝曰： 魂精魄灵，九天同生，石景水母，太阴朗明，徘徊月宫，冶炼金庭，二景合原，上吉时清，八会交带，我显克成，愿光愿容，愿鲜愿荣，愿神愿仙，飞行上清。 毕，仰引月精四十五咽止。 玄真洞飞二景宝经 凡修太霄之道，存回金珰玉佩之法，当兼御日月之精，以炼五胎之神招日中五帝、月中夫人，二景玄映，下降身形，使面有玉泽，体生奇光，内外 洞朗，心聪目明，於是玉佩可把，金珰可旋也。 魂魄帝尊，将憩子之房，晨灯虹映之光，将可立升也。 《玄真经》曰：太上玄玄，双神四明，玄真内映，明堂外清，吞息二晖，长生神精，上补司命，监御万灵，六华充溢，彻视黄宁。 凡四十字，太上刻於凤台之南轩也。 非总真弟子而不教，非司命之挺而弗传也。 欲修玄真法，存服日月#4在口中，白日存日，夜半存月，亦可存无昼夜，以分别於日也。 日色赤，月色黄，日有紫光九芒，月有白光十芒。 使日月对口，相去九尺，光芒向口，芒直如弦，以入於口也。 又存日月中央有女子，头巾紫巾，朱锦帔裙，自称太玄上真丹霞玉女，讳缠旋，字密真，口吐赤气，弥满日月光芒之间，令与芒霞并注，尽入我口，我咽之，存女亦口吐之，行之九十咽毕。 存觉令日月之景，亲薄我面上，令玉女之口置我口上，使气液来下，入於口中，我乃微祝曰： 太霄紫真，明堂阴神，日月景精，玉女缠旋，先自虚诞，厥字密真，首建紫华，芙蓉灵冠，身披锦帔，丹朱飞裙，出日入月，天光幽芬，口吐绛气，灌我三元，面亲天井，柔魄制魂，玄液流行，胎精长全，五脏生华，开童反颜，监御万灵，司命飞仙。 毕，存玉女之口津液，令注我口中，我又漱满而随咽之，又九十过止。 静心思感，行之务多，不复有限也。 若存日则不存月，存月则不存日也，要当均存之耳。 若不得服时，当存二景还面明堂中，日左月右，令日月辉与目同，合照四映二气，使相通注也。 亦可常存日月在明堂中，不待常所服日月之二景，而共兼用也。 行之五年，太玄玉女将下降於子，与之语话，太玄玉女亦能分形为数十玉女，任子之驱使也。 此积感结精，化生象见，精之至也，感之妙应也。 右日霞月精之道，挹二景之法，使人通灵致真，体生玉映，役命万神，上升帝房矣。 自无玄名於帝图，青简於方诸，玉藏紫络合真人者，终不得睹於玄文，参咏於灵篇。 见之者寿同三光，佩之者飞行上清，修之者得为真人。

**Morning Rites to the Nine Heavens’ Hun-Po Emperor Lords for Ascension to Immortality**

On the third, ninth, and sixteenth days of each lunar month at dawn, face the sun and perform nine bows and nine salutations—or simply bow in the heart. Lift the head, click the teeth twenty-four times, and softly intone the prayer:

*"Celestial Hun, ninefold coiled,
August Divine of the Supreme,
Essence of the sun’s great yang,
Golden Gate’s immortal change—
This humble one, [Name], ventures to present these words.
Today I make my supplication,
Eight wishes laid before thee:
Grant this rite’s petition,
Look down with dark grace.
Azure Dragon and Vermilion Phoenix,
Chariot of purple carriage,
Five clouds interlaced in shade,
Six qi fanning the dust,
Lofty and bending, the Three Lights descend in truth,
The Two Radiant Ones entwine me.
My Dao rejoices,
Heart bright, ears keen,
Eyes clear, complexion fresh,
Body light, bones ascending,
Face blooming with splendor,
Feathered raiment taking form,
Soaring to the Emperor’s Dawn."*

Conclude by lifting the head to draw in the sun’s essence, swallowing forty-five times.

Practicing this for three years, the eyes will see with penetrating clarity, gazing into the boundless. The face will bear a golden countenance, the body will generate jade-like fluids. After nine years, one shall walk without shadow, soaring through the empty void.

If the sky is overcast and the sun unseen, perform this in a secluded chamber with focused visualization—it will still resonate with the natural order.

On the fifth, fifteenth, and twenty-fifth days of each lunar month at the hour of *rending* (midnight), face the moon and perform nine bows and nine salutations—or simply bow in the heart. Lift the head toward the moon, click the teeth sixteen times, and pray:

*"Hun-essence, Po-spirit,
Born together in the Nine Heavens,
Stone Radiance, Water Mother,
Great Yin’s luminous clarity,
Wandering the Moon Palace,
Refining in the Golden Court,
The Two Radiant Ones merge their origin,
The hour is most auspicious, the time pure.
Eight gatherings intertwine,
I manifest and attain perfection.
Grant me light, grant me countenance,
Grant me freshness, grant me glory,
Grant me spirit, grant me immortality,
Soaring to the Upper Clarity."*

Conclude by lifting the head to draw in the moon’s essence, swallowing forty-five times.

---

**The Precious Scripture of the Dark Perfected’s Cavern-Flight and the Two Radiant Ones**

In cultivating the Dao of the Great Empyrean, the method of revolving the Golden Pendants and Jade Girdles must be paired with the absorption of the sun and moon’s essence to refine the spirits of the Five Embryos. Summon the Five Emperors of the sun’s midst and the Ladies of the moon, so that the Two Radiant Ones’ mysterious reflections descend into one’s form. The face will acquire a jade-like luster, the body will generate wondrous light, inner and outer brilliance will be fully illuminated, and the heart and eyes will become keen. Only then may the Jade Girdles be grasped and the Golden Pendants revolved.

The Hun-Po Emperor Lords will rest in your chamber, and the light of the Morning Lamp and rainbow-reflected mountain will be swiftly ascended.

The *Scripture of the Dark Perfected* states:
*"The Supreme’s profound profundity,
Dual spirits, Fourfold Clarity,
Dark Perfected’s inner radiance,
Bright Hall’s outer purity.
Swallowing the breath of the Two Lights,
Longevity’s spirit essence,
Ascending to assist the Controller of Destinies,
Overseeing the myriad spirits.
Six blossoms fill and overflow,
Penetrating vision of the Yellow Tranquility."*

These forty characters were inscribed by the Supreme on the southern eaves of the Phoenix Terrace. They are not taught to those who are not disciples of the Perfected Assembly, nor transmitted to those not chosen by the Controller of Destinies.

To cultivate the Dark Perfected method, visualize and ingest the sun and moon within the mouth: during the day, visualize the sun; at midnight, visualize the moon. Alternatively, one may visualize without distinction between day and night. The sun is red in color, the moon yellow. The sun has nine rays of purple light, the moon ten rays of white light. Position the sun and moon opposite the mouth, nine feet apart, their rays directed toward the mouth, straight as a bowstring, entering therein.

Further visualize at the center of the sun and moon a woman wearing a purple headscarf and a crimson brocade robe and skirt. She calls herself the Supreme Dark Perfected’s Cinnabar Cloud Jade Maiden, with the taboo name *Chanxuan* and the style *Mizhen*. From her mouth issues a red qi that fills the space between the sun and moon’s rays, merging with the radiant clouds to pour entirely into your mouth. You swallow it, and she too exhales it. Perform this ninety times.

Visualize the radiance of the sun and moon closely pressing upon your face, the Jade Maiden’s mouth placed over yours, allowing her qi and fluids to descend into your mouth. Then softly intone the prayer:

*"Great Empyrean’s Purple Perfected,
Bright Hall’s yin spirit,
Essence of the sun and moon’s radiance,
Jade Maiden Chanxuan,
First born of emptiness,
Whose style is Mizhen,
Head crowned with purple blossoms,
Lotus spirit diadem,
Body draped in brocade,
Crimson flying skirt,
Emerging from the sun, entering the moon,
Heavenly light’s subtle fragrance,
Mouth exhaling crimson qi,
Irrigating my Three Origins.
Face close to the Celestial Well,
Softening the po, restraining the hun,
Dark fluid flowing,
Embryonic essence ever whole,
Five viscera blooming,
Opening the childlike, reversing age,
Overseeing the myriad spirits,
Controller of Destinies’ flying immortal."*

Conclude by visualizing the Jade Maiden’s mouth fluids pouring into your mouth. Rinse and swallow them, repeating ninety times.

Calm the heart and focus the mind; practice diligently, without limit. When visualizing the sun, do not visualize the moon, and vice versa—they must be equally cultivated. If unable to ingest at the proper time, visualize the Two Radiant Ones returning to the Bright Hall, the sun on the left and the moon on the right, their brilliance aligned with the eyes, their combined illumination reflecting the Four Directions and the Two Qi, allowing mutual infusion.

Alternatively, one may constantly visualize the sun and moon within the Bright Hall, not only during the usual times of ingesting the Two Radiant Ones’ essences, but employing them together.

After five years of practice, the Supreme Dark Jade Maiden will descend to you and converse. She may also divide her form into dozens of Jade Maidens, ready to be commanded. This is the accumulation of resonance and the congealing of essence, giving rise to manifest visions—the utmost of refinement, the wondrous response of resonance.

The above is the Dao of the Sun’s Rosy Clouds and Moon’s Essence, the method of drawing in the Two Radiant Ones, enabling one to attain spirit communion and Perfected truth, the body generating jade-like radiance, commanding the myriad spirits, and ascending to the Emperor’s chamber.

Those whose names are not recorded in the Emperor’s register, whose jade slips are not in the *Fangzhu*, and whose purple cords are not bound to the Perfected—such persons shall never behold the Dark Scripture or chant the numinous verses. Those who see it shall have a lifespan equal to the Three Lights; those who wear it shall soar to the Upper Clarity; those who cultivate it shall become Perfected Ones.
